title: Kubectl Plugin
meta: KubeVault CLI is a kubectl plugin that supports various features using KubeVault. It automates numerous tedious tasks & simplifies interaction with Vault.

innerContent.title: KubeVault CLI
innerContent.description: KubeVault CLI is an integral part of the KubeVault operator. KubeVault CLI is a kubectl plugin that supports various handy features while using KubeVault. It automates numerous tedious tasks & provides simpler ways to interact with Vault. Itâ€™s possible to do CRUD operations on Vault unseal keys, root token stored in different clouds, generate SecretProviderClass, etc. with KubeVault CLI.
